L

LARGE - Enum constant in enum class game.ItemBuilder.ItemSize
 
level - Variable in class game.monsters.Monster
The monster's current level.
levelDamage - Variable in class game.monsters.Monster
The base damage for the monster's attacks at each level, (some random variation is applied).
levelMaxHealth - Variable in class game.monsters.Monster
The max health for the monster at each level (some random variation is applied).
levelUpCheck() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Checks if there is sufficient xp to reach the next level, and if so sets xp back to zero, increases the level (if not at maxLevel), and increases damage, maxHealth, and price accordingly.
